title: Resolutions against Sri Lanka based on personally commissioned Panel Report by UN Secretary General is illegitimate
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – There are some facts that the world needs to take cognizance of. Sri Lanka’s conflict has lasted 3 decades The initial training to arm Tamil youth took place in India clandestinely before 1983 – this nullifies any claim to use 1983 riots as an excuse for Tamils to take up arms…
